_header: Now of Saint James speak will we
Subjects: James the Less, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. James the Less in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
now of sancte Iames spek will weþat set is in þe sexte
                    degre…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…sa throw þi helpe I ma hynne twynebut schame det &
                    dedly syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.72-84.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.150-75.
